description:
From treeline to alpine, these cushioned socks stand up to multi-day backpacking trips. Made of a naturally antimicrobial merino wool blend that regulates foot temperature to keep your feet warm in the cool and cool in the heat.

  • Made of merino wool, nylon, and Lycra
  • Cushioned sole provide great comfort without bulk
  • Lightweight wool yarn in a ribbed performance knit with seamless construction ensures no slipping, no bunching and no blisters
  • Darn Tough sources their wool from non-mulesed sheep
name: Darn Tough Treeline Cushion Micro Crew Socks - Women's
